entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 7:27 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023
